benchmark_details.name: SHORTCUTS BENCH
benchmark_details.overview: SHORTCUTS BENCH is a large-scale benchmark for the comprehensive evaluation of API-based agents in solving real-world complex tasks, featuring real APIs, user queries, human-annotated action sequences, and detailed parameter filling.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive set of tasks to evaluate API-based agents and their ability to handle complex queries efficiently.

data.source: Data is extracted from existing Digital Automation Platforms (DAPs) and includes real APIs and user-generated shortcuts from Apple Shortcuts.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the number of correct actions predicted by the API-based agents.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance of agents in handling API calls, filling parameters, and recognizing when input is needed.
methodology.baseline_results: Evaluated against 10 advanced LLM-based agents, results show significant limitations in existing API-based agents in fulfilling complex queries.
methodology.validation: Exhaustive evaluation across various intelligence levels of LLMs on all task types.
